hero-heading: World's first metaverse blockchain network for the next decade of gaming.
buy-section-heading: Power the Future of Gaming & Metaverse
why-description: Virtu Pace is the blockchain built for the next generation of gaming and metaverse projects. Here’s why MEDO is your key to this revolution:
built-for-gaming-description: Specifically designed for tomorrow’s digital worlds.
early-access-description: Buy MEDO now at the best price!
ecosystem-desc: The Virtu Pace Blockchain is the foundation for an ambitious ecosystem, showcasing its capabilities through two groundbreaking projects. Together, they serve as a demonstration of what our blockchain can achieve, setting the stage for the next era of gaming and virtual worlds.
A fully immersive metaverse where players can own, trade, and build in a decentralized universe. Explore and shape digital worlds like never before.
clash-description: A strategic game where players deploy cryptocurrencies and stocks on tiles, waging real-time battles based on real-world price movements.
more-description: Stay tuned! We're about to launch a variety of exciting new games and experiences to enhance and expand your Virtu Pace ecosystem experience.
m-section-description: A rich and expensive virtual world where Ownership Matters. virtupace lets users build, trade, and interact in a limitless digital universe. From land ownership to immersive experiences, the possibilities are endless.
true-digital-ownership-description: Own land and assets in a fully decentralized metaverse.
monetization-description: Turn creativity and in-game assets into real-world value.
collaborative-world-building-description: Join forces with other players to shape entire cities.
tiles-based-warfare-description: Conquer tiles based on real-world price movements.
dynamic-battles-description: Gain MEDO points through strategic deployment and price tracking.
earn-and-expand-description: Increase your territory by earning MEDO and expanding your empire.
blockchain-description: Virtu Pace is built on advanced blockchain technology designed specifcally for the gaming and metaverse sectors. Our platform utilizes Zero-Knowledge Rollups (ZK-Rollups) to provide lightning-fast transaction speeds and minimal gas fees, ensuring a seamless gaming experience.
scalability-description: Supports thousands of transactions per second (TPS), accommodating the demands of complex gaming interactions.
gaming-optimized-description: Our architecture is designed specifcally for gaming applications, enabling rich and dynamic environments within the metaverse.
instant-finality-description: Transactions are confrmed within seconds, providing a responsive and fuid user experience.
q1-2025-description: Begin development of Virtu Pace blockchain
q2-2025-description: Release alpha version of Clash of Tiles.
q3-2025-description: Complete token swap process and launch MEDO coin
2026-description: Expand ecosystem with additional games and applications
what-is-virtu-pace-answer: Virtu Pace is a next-generation blockchain network specifcally designed for the gaming and metaverse sectors, ofering lightning-fast transaction speeds and minimal gas fees.
what-is-MEDO-answer: MEDO is the native currency of The Virtu Pace network, facilitating transactions within our ecosystem and serving as an in-game currency for various projects.
How can I participate in the presale?: How can I participate in the presale?
how-can-i-participate-in-the-presale-ans: To participate in the presale, users can purchase BSC tokens during the ICO phase. After the launch of The Virtu Pace blockchain, these tokens will be swappable for MEDO coins.
What games are being developed on Virtu: What games are being developed on Virtu Pace?
what-games-are-being-developed-on-virtu-: Our first official game is Clash of Tiles, with plans for additional projects like virtupace in the pipeline, showcasing the capabilities of The Virtu Pace blockchain.
how-does-staking-work-answer: MEDO holders can stake their coins to earn rewards and participate in governance decisions within The Virtu Pace ecosystem.
what-makes-virtu-pace-unique-answer: Our platform utilizes Zero-Knowledge Rollups to achieve high scalability and low fees, making it specifically optimized for gaming applications in the metaverse.
virtu-pace-community-description: At Virtu Pace, we believe that our community is the heart of our ecosystem. Engage with us through various channels to stay updated and share your thoughts
Launch your blockchain game with us and: Launch your blockchain game with us and be part of our journey as we build The Virtu Pace ecosystem together!
hero-description: With near zero gas fees and lightning-fast transactions, Virtu Pace will power a whole new generation of games where performance matters.
clash-section-description: Enter a competitive, strategic game where you Deploy Your Favorite Cryptocurrencies, Meme Coins, or Stocks on tiles to wage battle for dominance.
page_description: Step into Virtu Pace, a virtual world where imagination knows no limits. Send your digital avatar to explore, play, trade, and own land in a vibrant metaverse filled with fantasy experiences and endless adventures.
page_title: Virtu Pace Presale is Live - Lighting Fast Blockchain Network
how_to_buy_title: How to Buy Virtu Pace Tokens
how_to_buy_desc: Our presale page supports payments through both decentralized wallet transactions using various cryptocurrencies and credit card payments, providing flexibility for all users. For credit card purchases, users can either log in with Google or email or directly connect an existing decentralized wallet if they already have one.

decentralized_wallet_payment.title: Payment Using Decentralized Wallets (Metamask, Trust Wallet)
decentralized_wallet_payment.description: For those paying with ETH, BNB, POL, SOL, TRX, or USDT (available on Ethereum, BSC, and Polygon chains), a decentralized wallet is required.

setup_wallet.title: Set Up Your Wallet
setup_wallet.step_1: Install a decentralized wallet such as MetaMask or Trust Wallet on your mobile device or as a browser extension.

fund_wallet.title: Fund Your Wallet
fund_wallet.step_1: Ensure you have enough of the selected cryptocurrency (e.g., ETH, BNB) in your wallet. Purchase it on a centralized exchange (e.g., Binance, Coinbase) and transfer it to your decentralized wallet.
fund_wallet.step_2: You'll need a small amount of the native currency (e.g., ETH for Ethereum) to cover network transaction fees.

connect_wallet.title: Connect Wallet to Presale Page
connect_wallet.step_1: Visit The Virtu Pace presale page.
connect_wallet.step_2: Click "Connect" Wallet and choose your wallet provider (e.g., MetaMask, Trust Wallet).
connect_wallet.step_3: Authorize the connection through your wallet app.

complete_payment.title: Complete the Payment
complete_payment.step_1: Select the token you wish to use for the purchase and specify the amount.
complete_payment.step_2: Confirm the transaction in your wallet, reviewing the network fees and details.
complete_payment.step_3: Upon confirmation, your purchased Virtu Pace tokens will be reserved for you until the listing event.

claim_tokens.title: Claim Tokens at Listing
claim_tokens.step_1: After listing, you can revisit the presale platform, reconnect your wallet, and claim your purchased Virtu Pace tokens.

credit_card_payment.title: Payment Using Credit Card
credit_card_payment.description: For credit card payments, we offer two options: users can log in with Google or email, or connect an existing decentralized wallet if they prefer.

choose_login_method.title: Choose Your Login Method
choose_login_method.step_1: On The Virtu Pace presale page, select "Pay with Card".
choose_login_method.step_2: You can choose to either log in with Google or email or connect your existing decentralized wallet (e.g., MetaMask, Trust Wallet).
choose_login_method.step_3: If you connect your wallet, it will act as the destination for your presale tokens once the purchase is complete.

complete_payment_card.title: Complete the Payment with Card
complete_payment_card.step_1: Enter the amount of Virtu Pace tokens you wish to buy and provide your credit card details.
complete_payment_card.step_2: Confirm the transaction, after which your purchased tokens will appear in the account linked to your Google/email login or decentralized wallet.

claim_tokens_card.title: Claim Tokens at Listing
claim_tokens_card.step_1: On listing day, log back in (either via Google/email or your connected wallet) to claim your tokens.
claim_tokens_card.step_2: If you used Google/email, you can transfer your tokens from the auto-generated wallet to a decentralized wallet of your choice (e.g., MetaMask, Trust Wallet).

project_announcements_description: Be the first to know about important milestones, partnerships, and upcoming events.
behind_the_scenes_description: Get insights into the development process, meet our team, and learn about the technology powering Virtu Pace.
educational_content_description: Explore articles that explain blockchain concepts, gaming mechanics, and tips for participating in The Virtu Pace ecosystem.
community_spotlights_description: Highlighting contributions and stories from our community members.
follow_blog_description: Keep your finger on the pulse of Virtu Pace and the evolving landscape of blockchain gaming.
news_desc: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, developments, and educational content from Virtu Pace.
